p: Territory of Washington County of Jefferson } ss

Ding Yen Chung being first duly sworn upon oath says that he has heard the foregoing petition read, knows the contents thereof and that the same are true, That he makes this verification in behald of the petitioner Mrs Lee Sing Wot
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 19th day of April 1889
Notary Public in & for Wash Terr
